title: I Can Only Imagine
lyrics:
I can only imagine 
What it will be like 
When I walk 
By Your side 
I can only imagine 
What my eyes will see 

When Your face 

Is before me 

I can only imagine 



[Chorus]:

Surrounded by Your glory, what will my heart feel 

Will I dance for You Jesus or in awe of You be still 

Will I stand in Your presence or to my knees will I fall 

Will I sing hallelujah, will I be able to speak at all 

I can only imagine 



I can only imagine 

When that day comes 

And I find myself 

Standing in the Son 

I can only imagine 

When all I will do 

Is forever 

Forever worship You 

I can only imagine
